member.name: _IManipulationEvents.ManipulationCompleted
member.summary: Handles the event when manipulation or inertia finishes.
member.param: The origin x-coordinate in user-defined coordinates.
The origin y-coordinate in user-defined coordinates.
The total translation about the x-axis since the beginning of the manipulation in user-defined coordinates.
The total translation about the y-axis since the beginning of the manipulation in user-defined coordinates.
The total scale change since the beginning of the manipulation as a percentage of the original size.
The total expansion change since the beginning of the manipulation in user-defined coordinates.
The total rotation change since the beginning of the manipulation in radians.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: _IManipulationEvents.ManipulationDelta
member.summary: Handles events that happen when a manipulated object changes.
member.param: The origin x-coordinate in user-defined coordinates.
The origin y-coordinate in user-defined coordinates.
The translation change about the x-axis in user-defined coordinates since the last event.
The translation change about the y-axis in user-defined coordinates since the last event.
The scale change since the previous event as a percentage of the previous scale.
The expansion change since the previous event in user-defined coordinates.
The rotation change since the previous event in radians.
The translation about the x-axis since the beginning of the manipulation in user-defined coordinates.
The translation about the y-axis since the beginning of the manipulation in user-defined coordinates.
The scale change since the beginning of the manipulation as a percentage of the original size.
The expansion change since the beginning of the manipulation in user-defined coordinates.
The rotation change since the beginning of the manipulation in radians.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: _IManipulationEvents.ManipulationStarted
member.summary: Handles the event for when manipulation or inertia begins.
member.param: The origin x-coordinate in user-defined coordinates.
The origin y-coordinate in user-defined coordinates.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.
